website_summaries.verdict: Get ready to relax with this elegant porch swing. Made from a high-quality material that repels dirt and won't absorb moisture, this fantastic porch swing will become your new favorite seat.
pros: Comes in a variety of colors to match your style
Made from recycled plastic that stands up well to the elements
Durable, and has a 500-pound weight capacity
cons: Some consumers gripe about quality control issues that include missing or broken pieces upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Terrible material and overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Swing disintegrated after one year. One piece broke off the back of the bench where it attaches to the back rest, then a few weeks later, the whole swing fell apart (see photo). Also very difficult to assemble. Overpriced Junk...
customer_reviews.author: Corinne Graham

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for Alabama size people
customer_reviews.text: This is the swing on my front porch. Looks lovely and I bet the frame would break before the swing! Too soon to know if it's going to get moldy over the winter but I will update this review if it does.
customer_reviews.author: AprilWhine

customer_reviews.title: 2 1/2 stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for appearance. 3 stars for material. I've shopped around and looked at other "plastic wood" items. The landscaping places sell better quality items but I liked the design of this swing and assumed for the price it would be comparible. However, this item is undeceivingly plastic! Seems heavy and hopefully will be durable but time will tell. 1 star for assembly....very difficult. The pre-filled holes were not well aligned. It took longer than it should have!
customer_reviews.author: JavaandGiraffes

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturers have been wonderful to work with - at first attempt I received the wrong color, second attempt my hardware was missing a bolt from the package. However, they go above and beyond to make things right. Enjoying many porch sits on this beautiful, durable swing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  swing
customer_reviews.text: It really is great... we're very happy with the swing. I have to say it was disappointing to see that the day after we got it the price went from the $380 we paid to $359. Other than that and maybe because of the lower price I would definitely recommend the swing. Just wish I'd save $21 by ordering a few days later. :-)
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Design, all worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine 2015 and it’s now April 2020 - I’m writing review coz a friend is asking info re this swing and I believe I owe this company a good review. Easy to assemble. It’s the only material that you want to use in FL with all the rain, sun, storms, HUMIDITY. PERFECT swing in my pergola. We enjoy using it all year round specially in the cold evenings when me make our s’mores. Now a friend is buying one for their home.
customer_reviews.author: braggy808

customer_reviews.title: Quality and customer service are excellent
customer_reviews.text: This swing is beautiful and the quality feels great. The chains were a little short for my porch, but it was easy to add a small piece of chain to bring it down a bit. My 10 year old put most of this together with just a little help. There was a piece that broke off one of the armrests in shipping. Dealing with customer service was a dream and a replacement arm is on the way.
customer_reviews.author: rainy days

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.  Top rail of back piece is cracked.  **Update from original review**
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, sturdiness and comfort. So disappointed that it arrived damaged. ***Update***** Called company to resolve issue of cracked backrest. Customer service responded immediately and will be shipping a new backrest within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: PIPLEME

customer_reviews.title: No repaint every couple years.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I added springs to the chain and a beautiful pad. It is my happy spot in my yard. Looks great and I don’t have to paint every couple of years. At first assemble it set up a little too straight all I did was adjust the chains and now it leans back comfortably. I am very curious how many years it lasts. As for now very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and tough
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well constructed and looking swing but I ordered the wrong color and length and they dont have what my wife really wants. I should know better than to take on purchasing for her on my own! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Rocky's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Super quality and extremely comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Just put the swing together and hung it the other day. Super sturdy and fantastic quality, no issues during assembly at all. Can’t wait to spend some serious time on this bench for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: A. Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Never paint your swing again!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and easy to assemble. The extra cost of this model swing is worth it in the time you save never painting. My last porch swing was made of wood and the joints collected water. I painted it every year and this year it finally rotted out. This one should last a long time. The only thing that could damage it is the sun and that should be many years off if ever.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C.

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad it arrived broken so that I could return right ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken right where the screw hole is. In a way, I'm glad it arrived broken so that I could return right away because based on the location of the damage, it would only be a short amount of time until the same thing happened on it's own. I purchased the polywood vineyard swing in replacement and it's super sturdy and I'm really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenuine Home & Instant Pot Creations

customer_reviews.title: The perfect swing
customer_reviews.text: I shopped multiple places before I decided on this swing. We love the color, comfort, size , and durability. Very straightforward in assembly. It’s a total winner. I’d buy another and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Swing
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after a few months. Can't use out of fear it will collapse. This was a replacement. First one was also cracked. Find another swing
customer_reviews.author: kimberly avallone

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, we are very pleased. Front seat edge could be rounded a bit to make more comfortable, then this swing would be 100% perfect!
customer_reviews.author: sherjohn

customer_reviews.title: High quality Swing
customer_reviews.text: I have had this swing now for over a year and its sturdy and comfortable. Looks brand new even out in the weather. I highly recommend this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Shucks

customer_reviews.title: Had to return. Was broken in the box. ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Was broken in the box. Examine closely.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just go this today - easy to assembly - I’m 250+ and my partner is 160 and is very sturdy. GREAT PRoduct!
customer_reviews.author: Scott M Etter

customer_reviews.title: I need help!!!!  Missing pieces and can't put my swing together
customer_reviews.text: I am missing one screw! I needed 6 1/4 " 20 X 2 screws and I only got 5. Is there anyone that can help me with this??
customer_reviews.author: Madstrio

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and maintenance free
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had our swings almost 2 years. We leave them outside year round in 4 seasons...and they still look awesome! Very comfortable and maintenance free.
customer_reviews.author: PC Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Superior Swing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product in both fit and finish. Took 30 minutes to put together. Instructions were simple and easy to follow. I bought this because composite products last much longer than wood in my environment plus it had a 12 year warranty. Although some think it is pricey, if you believe that wood swings need to be replaced every 3-5 years, this product is very cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: Iain Reilly

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I've had the 4 ft version of this swing for about a week now. It was very easy to assemble. The directions were clear and there are only 6 pieces to attach using bolts and a supplied hex wrench. Took about 15-20 minutes from start to finish. Was really well packaged and arrived undamaged. I bought this b/c it was a cheaper alternative to the polywood namebrand. I chose the white color and it looks like the picture on Amazon. Nice clean, bright white. Feels sturdy. So far, so good. I'd highly recommend this hanging kit which comes with "comfort springs". Gives the bench a nice bounce to it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bates

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product met all of my expectations for construction, comfort and looks. Now, it just has to meet them for longevity. My wife and family love the addition to our porch. The swing is sturdy, comfortable, and looks great. It came well packaged, with easy to follow assembly instructions. I had this swing together in no time. If they wanted to improve further, they could offer a mounting kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Jirovsky

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We sit on this swing everyday! It's a great product for the money and well worth the extra to not have wood to rot and repaint every season.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Tidmore

customer_reviews.title: My family and I totally love this swing
customer_reviews.text: My family and I totally love this swing!! We had a wooden one for years, but it eventually rotted away. We wanted one that would last much longer and took a chance on this one. Wow! We are so happy! It arrived quickly and was so easy to assemble. My 5 year old grandson and I had it together within 20 minutes. Now we spend many summer days enjoying time together on our "big brown swing".
customer_reviews.author: Annette Heth

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The swing was exactly what was advertised and exactly what I ordered. I am pleased with the product even though the winter months have limited my time to enjoy it. The product is great, but my only concern was the carrier delivering my swing had some unexplained glitch and there was a lengthy delay in delivery.
customer_reviews.author: William Hall

customer_reviews.title: Overall EXCELLENT...except for broken arm
customer_reviews.text: Lovely swing, however the left arm arrived broken. As this was the last piece that needed to be put together on the swing, we did not return it, however we are letting the company know that additional QA is likely needed. Based on where the break was, we are assuming it was not a result of shipping. We did take pictures and can send to company as needed. Considering the amount we paid for this swing, we believe a discount is in order. We do believe that we can repair the break, which is why we decided to keep it. However, aside from the break in the arm, the material is lovely and will be low maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with this product
customer_reviews.text: It cracked next to the bolt that connects the swing to the chain. I’ve only had it one month and we didn’t exceed the weight limit on it. It is nice looking and comfortable but quality is questionable.
customer_reviews.author: danysdisaster

customer_reviews.title: Highwood Poly Porch Swing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this porch swing for my wife's birthday. I researched the web for a quality product. This product was the best I could find for the price. It is of high quality and will hold 500 lbs. I purchased the 4 foot model to accommodate my front porch. It is weather resistant and fairly easy to put together. I would recommend this as a quality unit, but I don't recommend it for commercial use. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D Voegtlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice swing
customer_reviews.text: Looks like real wood. Very sturdy. Already one of our favorite places to hang out
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Good Swing but Label/Plaque is Crooked and slightly scuffed up in shipping
customer_reviews.text: Swing is very well made and probably will last a long time. But, the swing pieces were roughed up in shipping and the white color was scuffed up in shipping. And, the glued on plaque on the front of the swing is crooked. Probably just luck of the draw if gets damaged in shipping and/or the factory guy attaching the plaque has his glasses on.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble bought the two matching rockers love them
customer_reviews.author: jan meredith

customer_reviews.title: Happy wife.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but a little awkward assembling by yourself. My wife was happy so happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: hemi56

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Porch Swing
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! Looks beautiful on our front porch. Assembly not terribly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Love this swing
customer_reviews.text: Material looks like wood, but will last forever!....this is a wonderful swing!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl S.

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: This swing has been great. Only complaint is it seems to creek and flex with 2 people on it. Never enough to be a concern, but would have preferred it to be a little bit more sturdy. All that being said i would definitely buy it again. The finish still looks great a year later with no maintenance. I highly recommend a set of springs for the chains as it reduces the feel of any flexing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Patio Swing
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable patio swing. My wife and I were able to install it. We will see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Reid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful swing my wife’s favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality porch swing very well designed with high quality materials looks great in my yard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Porch Swing Composite Material
customer_reviews.text: We really hope this last a very long time, as it was expensive and we really like it! The grey color is great in our wooded area that we hung this in.
customer_reviews.author: KCC

customer_reviews.title: Great porch swing!
customer_reviews.text: I love the lehigh porch swing. Looks beautiful on my front porch with the rockers. Comfortable and easy to clean. So glad not to habe to paint anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Snead

customer_reviews.title: Overall Nice
customer_reviews.text: Solid porch bench. Definitely need to purchase a cushion for comfort. Bench was delivered missing 2 screw inserts. Called company and they were very courteous and apologetic. They shipped me missing hardware in less than a week. Overall nice bench swing and seems sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: is more comfortable, and will hold up much better in our ...
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an old rusty wrought iron swing in our back yard. It looks much nicer, is more comfortable, and will hold up much better in our Florida climate. When it arrived one on the arms was broken. I contacted Highwood customer care and spoke to Alyssa who was very helpful and shipped a new arm within two days. It was easy to assemble, easy to hang, and looks great. Our three grand-daughters love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Swing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a swing last year for about $125. It lasted 1 year before it rotted and broke. It hung under a deck so it was not exposed to harsh weather. My new Highwood swing is more expensive but comes with a 12 year warranty. It is very pretty and comfortable. It was delivered in a sturdy box and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dawson

customer_reviews.title: love this swing
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing, looks beautiful and sturdy like it will last 100 years and will hold up to all the seasons. The only problem we had was installing the 3" stainless screws, they got bent installing them so I just went to hardware store and bought my own and finished putting together, but I still gave a 4 star and would recommend for anyone to purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: suzzie Q

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The first one was delivered damaged due to shipping, but when we returned it and reordered, the second one was perfect. It is now hanging on our front porch and provides musch joy when used. Could not be more satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cohen

customer_reviews.title: The quality is sub-par.
customer_reviews.text: After doing the research I was sure that this would be a keeper. Unfortunately, once I opened the box I was seriously let down. Many of the back slats were not installed properly and were loose. There were multiple chips in the "wood" and there were also some pieces missing. Fortunately, Amazon was great about the return. They sent UPS to pick it up the next day and gave me excellent customer service along the way. I ended up ordering the Polywood swing in the end and never looked back. The Polywood swing is made to much higher standards and has been a welcome addition to our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Average Tom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money?  yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality, expert packing, and overall this is expert craftsmanship, we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: T D

customer_reviews.title: Great porch swing.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well made. It doesn’t get too hot to sit on when the swing has been in the sun all day. Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: green bean

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: We considered a lot of other swings and this one was a lot less expensive. We originally ordered another swing and then that one ended up being back ordered. As it turns out we got lucky because we got this one instead which was far cheaper and is perfect for our space
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Really, something like this would sell for in the 4 to 5 figures at a Restoration Hardware or a Pacific Design Center. The only reason for 4 stars is that I didn't like how there was a sticker on the bottom of the bench saying something along the lines of the "materials found in this item are known to the state of California to cause cancer". Prop 65. That wasn't the most inviting thing to read while setting it up. Other then that, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to replace an old wooden swing that constantly needed repainting. It was worth every penny. It is very solid, very comfortable and extremely well made. Instead of hanging it with chains or cords through the small holes on the arm rests, we bypassed the hole and went directly to the hooks that are built in. The reason is that we use marine grade anchor chain and it was much larger than the hole. We already had the chain installed, and liked the heavy duty feel it provides. The chain that comes with the swing is quite substantial, too. Hard to believe we could purchase and have something of this quality delivered in two days!
customer_reviews.author: GeeWhiz

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and built to last!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, goes together easily and instructions are clear and easy to follow. Nice touch is that the chains are stainless steel which means no rusting or discoloration. Very comfortable to sit on with some light rocking, feels solid and built to last!
customer_reviews.author: CT FF/EMT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it came in a few pieces but was very surprised how easy it was to put together and hang. It does need two people but it looks great and feels sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Gina M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well on my porch and was easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: KMS717

customer_reviews.title: Very good outdoor swing
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this one. You will definitely need two people to assemble..
customer_reviews.author: Santhosh Parameswaran

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swing. Had a carpenter hang it on the front porch. Quality is very nice, many compliments from the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We are happy the way it looks, the quality, and it went together well.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Score

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a solid swing. Looks great and feels very sturdy. I am very satisfied with the ease of assembly. Not sure why the other people reviewing this said that their pre-drilled holes were off (maybe a faulty bench or maybe Highwood made some corrections), but mine fit up perfectly. 5 stars. The only thing missing is the add on cup holders. I am buying those tonight!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Johel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love our swing. Second one we’ve owned and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: thoganfk

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Looks great. It should last for a long time. Best packaging on anything I've ever received. 30 to 45 minutes to assemble. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DARRIN CHAMBERS

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement for a swing we hung when we built our house. Well built, smooth finish.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thrall

customer_reviews.title: Great swing at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Great swing. Got this for my grandma because her wooden one kept splintering. Very easy assembly and very sturdy. She enjoys sitting on it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Camp-a-Lamp

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love this porch swing! My Dad put it together in under an hour. It's so comfortable! I love it!
customer_reviews.author:
AHENSEL
Ahensel

customer_reviews.title: Superior in quality and appearance
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Superior quality and appearance.Easy to follow assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very comfortable. They are new so how they hold up is yet to be determined. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful swing. Very high quality. Easy to assemble. Packaged well for shipping. You will not be disappointed . My family LOVES this swing.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love my porch swing
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a porch swing. Brought this because of price and quality. The first porch swing was damaged. The company fixed the problem fast.
customer_reviews.author: Sososcruffy

customer_reviews.title: Great swing!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and hang. The swing seems very sturdy and is very comfortable. The wife loves it!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Swing is assslappin good!
customer_reviews.text: As stated in the headline, this swing is assslappin good!
customer_reviews.author: such

customer_reviews.title: A Winner in every Way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a joy! Super fast delivery and free, excellent packaging, not a single ding or mark, easy to assemble and best of all, looks and feels fabulous! A Perfect "Made in America" product!!!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The inset bolts completely stripped while putting it together. Way overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Waltz

customer_reviews.title: It looks fantastic on my porch
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic on my porch! I had to get it professionally installed (offered by Amazon) since I couldn't find the joists, but they got it up and it's so nice to sit in.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea E. Wiggin

customer_reviews.title: it's together and feels sturdy. I will add a photo soon
customer_reviews.text: I'm really enjoying this swing. It was a bit difficult to assemble, and I had to put my full body weight onto at specific angles to get some of the areas to line up. I think some others mentioned this. I don't know if shipping/storage caused some of the boards to bend. Regardless, it's together and feels sturdy. I will add a photo soon.
customer_reviews.author: Jessamyn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, is comfortable and makes my front entry look ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, is comfortable and makes my front entry look very charming. I’ll admit it was a little difficult to put together. Make sure your support joists are in the right place for where you want to hang it, otherwise it is a little bit of a project to get this to hang safely.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic swing, great quality, good value
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love, Love, LOVE this swing. It was easy to assemble, sturdy and extremely attractive - we could not be more pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and arrived in two days
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and arrived in two days. Looks better than pictured, and you can tell by construction that it will take a beating from Mother Nature.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby V

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this swing
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this swing. Got it for our front porch and am so glad I got this vs a wood swing. It will last so much longer without splintering or warping.
customer_reviews.author: April Lankford

customer_reviews.title: Shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift and the box appears to have a lot of damage. I certainly hope all the parts and pieces are there! I don't want to open it but might have to do just that!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Issue
customer_reviews.text: Can someone contact me ... the arm came in broken .
customer_reviews.author: Michigan.mom

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great.
customer_reviews.text: Impressed by quality. Easy assembly. Looks like real wood, no plastic feel. Appear like it will hold up to the elements.
customer_reviews.author: D. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Swing! Well made and very solid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Swing! Well made and very solid. I hope to enjoy it for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Flagwaiver

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Quality product that would be difficult to improve. After purchasing two of these swings we added a bench with arms and two of the backless benches. These are exceptional products.
customer_reviews.author: weh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product and service was great. One of the arms were broken inside the box when it arrived, made a call to Highwood customer service and explained what was wrong. After submitting a few pics and a copy of the invoice they shipped a new one out right away. Can't really figure out how the arm broke because everything was so well packaged. This is a good quality swing and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: ... swing and the instructions for this priced item are poor at best
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this swing and the instructions for this priced item are poor at best. Incomplete and very little detail. Really, how hard can it be to provide more than the very little detail and non-specific pictures. Dissappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A really nice swing. Replaced a wooden one the rotted out ...
customer_reviews.text: A really nice swing. Replaced a wooden one the rotted out in 4 years. This is very well built and should last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: ED Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Made in America!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great swing, easy to assemble, 12 yr warranty, built to last. Best of all it's not from China.
customer_reviews.author: Woodysil

customer_reviews.title: but was easily put together
customer_reviews.text: The porch swing seems to be made of high quality materials. There was some installation required, but was easily put together. I definitely would recommend Highwood Lehigh Porch Swing to any looking for this type of product.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bangert

customer_reviews.title: Recommend This Product Highly
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be very good quality, was easy to assemble and looks good. The stainless steel chains are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: LBFM

customer_reviews.title: It is a very sturdy and it’s absolutely beautiful! Very very sturdy. All around great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this swing! It was a gift for my mother and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: shelley234

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my porch in New Orleans, tired of re placing and painting the other swings...so far, so good
customer_reviews.author: pengochay

customer_reviews.title: It is holding up nicely and the best thing is
customer_reviews.text: We are enjoying our swing. However, after sitting a while, you will need a cushion. It is holding up nicely and the best thing is: no painting year after year!
customer_reviews.author: vml

customer_reviews.title: This is the best swing. We purchased a cedar one in 2009 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best swing. We purchased a cedar one in 2009 and wish we had gone for this product then. We wouldn't be replacing it now. We added the cup holder to either side and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Beach lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Quality Swing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this porch swing! It is excellent quality and easy to assemble. The color is perfect and true to description.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Will order another one win it goes on sale for 369.00. Let me know
customer_reviews.author: ronald r hartline

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made; easy to assemble. Arrived on time, looks great on our new porch. Look forward to many swinging days with my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Feed Man

customer_reviews.title: Love the swing and it is a perfect addition to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the swing and it is a perfect addition to our front porch! However, it was really hard to put together as the holes did not line up properly.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great swing
customer_reviews.text: Great swing, especially with the addition of cup holders to match. No one has been able to tell that it is not a wooden swing. I would buy the same swing again if I were in the market for a second swing.
customer_reviews.author: Lafourche

customer_reviews.title: Only took me 10 minutes to put together and it looks great in my backyard
customer_reviews.text: It showed up broken and before getting of the phone with them a new one was on its way. Only took me 10 minutes to put together and it looks great in my backyard.
customer_reviews.author: SUPER STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality. Just arrived and it was a breeze ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Quality. Just arrived and it was a breeze to assemble. Looking forward to many years of use.
customer_reviews.author: DrT

product_meta.title: Highwood AD-PORL1-ACE Lehigh Porch Swing, 5 Feet, Weathered Acorn
product_meta.description: Color:Weathered Acorn| Size:5 FeetWelcome to highwood®. Welcome to relaxation. We are proud to offer the wood-replacement material of choice, as used in America’s largest theme parks, coastal resorts and hot-tub cabinets; now available for your own backyard! All the class and elegance of the highwood® Lehigh Collection is inherent in this Porch Swing. Choose from 4ft or 5ft widths and a variety of colors sure to complement your piece of paradise. Throw in your favorite decorative pillows and a cozy blanket for an evening gazing at the stars. A free zinc-plated steel chain is supplied so swing is “ready to hang” to a sturdy structure. Please use strong hooks (not provided) to hang the chain from and support the weight of the loaded swing. Each swing contains (2) 7ft chains and (2) 2ft chains. Total height from end of chain attached at ceiling to top of seat is 80”. Additional chain can be purchased upon request. The proprietary Highwood high-grade poly lumber used in this product offers the most realistic look of natural wood WITHOUT the headaches of maintaining or replacing every few seasons. Simply wash your highwood® furniture to remove any dirt or grime. Explore the entire line of highwood® products to coordinate other beautiful, durable products that will make your outdoor living space the envy of the neighborhood. Still not sure? Request a free product swatch so you can view the color and composition in person. This product is assembled with 304-grade stainless steel hardware and comes with the assurance of a manufacturer’s 12-year residential limited warranty. The swing has been load-tested, per ASTM 1561-03 (2008) standard for outdoor plastic furniture, and has a 500-pound weight capacity. Some assembly is required (see assembly guide) and assembled 5ft swing is 64"W x 22"H x 24"D (44lbs), assembled 4ft swing is 52"W x 22"H x 24"D (38lbs).
feature_bullets: Proudly and 100% made in the USA from our own unique synthetic wood in an environmentally-conscious Facility
Choose from 4 foot or 5 foot widths and a variety of colors sure to complement your piece of paradise
The porch swing has been load-tested and has a 500 pound weight capacity. Includes a free zinc-plated steel chain
Durable, fade resistant material assembled with 304 Grade stainless Steel hardware means ultra-low maintenance - leave it outside Year Round.Chair Back Height:19 inch
Comes with manufacturer's 12-year residential limited . Some assembly required and assembled 5ft swing = 64" W x 22" H x 44" D (44lbs), assembled 4ft swing = 52" W x 22" H x 44" D (38lbs)
